answers.answer: Thanks for using the forum.It is hard to guess at what is causing your dark spots without seeing them, but one possibility would be Acanthosis nigracans. This is a fairly common skin discoloration. The hallmark of acanthosis nigracans is dark patches of skin with a thick, velvety texture which may appear in many places on the body including skin folds.Acanthosis nigricans can be a symptom of more serious health problems such as pre-diabetes. It usually clears up when the underlying medical condition is successfully treated.I recommend that you see your doctor about theses spots. If acanthosis nigricans is the cause, your doctor would be the best person to prescribe treatment.I hope this helpsCathy
Awesome, thank you sooo much! Im really gonna look into this.

question: I have dark dry spots between my breast and between my stomach fold. They peel but never go away. When i grab my skin together it gets darker. Almost looks like a stretch mark but its not. What could this be? I really dislike this :/
title: Dark dry spots
